subject: Datona Energy /Natural Gas
body:
Dear Valued Investor:

		 

Below please find a link to read the 
		corporate profile for Daytona Energy 
		Corporation 
(DTE:TSX.V). 
Daytona Energy Corporation is 
		a natural gas company with 3 projects in North America. The company's  
		Brazeau River project in Alberta currently has 2 producing wells. 
 

 

Mr. Jim 
			Breimayer reports: 

Daytona Energy Corp. has successfully 
			completed stimulation of the Gething interval in the Brazeau River 
			2-5-48-14 W5M well located in west-central Alberta.

According to Daytona's chief executive 
			officer, Jim Breimayer: "While it is too early to quantify reserve 
			additions, we are encouraged by the significant increase in flow 
			rate from this stimulation and the low-cost reserves that may have 
			been added. We are also excited about the implications it may have 
			for further low-risk development drilling on this unit. This well is 
			the only well on its 640-acre unit and may have development drilling 
			potential as well."

Prior to the stimulation, the well was 
			producing 200 to 300 thousand cubic feet per day. After the 
			stimulation, the well has flowed at rates as high as 1.4 million 
			cubic feet per day. This well was originally completed in January, 
			2005, and had produced over 400 million cubic feet of reserves prior 
			to the stimulation. Daytona owns a 6-per-cent working interest in 
			the well and in the 640-acre unit it holds. 


In addition, the Alberta Energy Utilities 
			Board has recently approved the downspacing of the Gething formation 
			in this area from 640 acres per well to 320 acres per well. This may 
			provide additional drilling within Section 5-48-14 W5M and Section 
			32-47-14 W5M where Daytona also has 6-per-cent working interest.
			
 


		 

Common Shares lssued - 34 million
		Market Capitalization - $5.1 million
